title: Democratic Values Realization Strategies in Islamic Dormitory Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Securing accessibility for teenage secondary learners in vocational training institutions through smartphone-based microlearning. Requires case-based content applicable to field settings

learning_goals: In Islamic boarding school settings, learners can systematically explain democratic decision-making processes divided into three or more stages.
Through case analysis, learners can propose at least two strategies for integrating democratic values into religious educational institutions.
In mobile learning environments, learners can utilize peer assessment and feedback to propose practical solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
